Hydras:

"Another kisss"hissed Hydras and kissed her apassionaly once more 
time, after he broke the kiss (after a while) said "Remember if 
someone said "Predacons shall rule" in your beauty hear it's my 
spy... don't delay..."


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, EmprzAnastazia@a... wrote:
> In a message dated 2/25/03 12:53:08 PM Central Standard Time, 
> airly2002@h... writes:
> 
> 
> > "But now"hissed the male "The dragon and tiger will be the 
symbol of 
> > rule and conquest"
> > 
> 
> She nodded. "That .. they will, my Lord Hydras," purred that 
sultry feline 
> voice.  
> 
> Her long, metallic claws slid slowly down from his multicolored 
faceplate, 
> grazing over his neck joint, over his shoulder, circling the 
chestplate then 
> spreading off to his arms. Her optics followed her claws, then 
turned back up 
> to his faceplate. 
> 
> She supposed that she should go on her mission soon. Despite the 
fact, she 
> didn't want to leave. But, the idea of adventure was calling her. 
> 
> Leaning closer to him, her metallic lips brushing against his, 
softly purring 
> in that sultry feline voice, "Before I start my mission... 
another... kiss... 
> for luck?"
